name: Garfield and the Legend of the Lasagna
name_original: Garfield and the Legend of the Lasagna
description:
Garfield is on the hunt for some lasagna! Follow this silly lazy cat and his bumbling owner Jon in this epic RPG adventure!

Garfield and the Legend of the Lasagna is a free FAN GAME and submission for the 2022 Davis Game Jam (May 22). 

Accredidations:

  • Yanfly: http://www.yanfly.moe/wiki/Main_Page
  • GALV:  https://galvs-scripts.com
  • William Burke: https://williamburkeart.com/the-corrupted-gallery
  • PAWs Inc
  • freesound.com and Kinoton for the laugh track

The Garfield sprite was my own design, although I do not own his likeness (duh). All pixel sprites and tiles are my own design. Audio is stock
